pkgmetadata.longdescription: Safety Diagnostics for Dose-Escalation Trial Designs // Enhances various R packages that support the design and simulation of phase 1 dose-escalation trials, adding diagnostics to examine the safety characteristics of these designs in light of expected inter-individual variation in pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics. See Norris (2020), "Retrospective analysis of a fatal dose-finding trial" arXiv:2004.12755.
